title: Obstetrics and Gynecology Simulation-Based Team Training Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic obstetrics knowledge and fundamental first-aid skills
context.additional_context: Simulation-based training conducted for a mixed team of current obstetric practitioners (obstetricians, residents, midwives, nurses), utilizing virtual scenarios to replicate real clinical situations.

learning_goals: Participants can identify obstetric/emergency scenarios (e.g., umbilical cord prolapse, postpartum hemorrhage) and perform appropriate initial responses with over 90% accuracy
Team members rate teamwork and communication efficiency with over 85% satisfaction scores post-simulation training
Learners improve technical proficiency by 30% through repeated practice of five+ obstetric simulations in a 6-month curriculum
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
